description: Slim, lightweight, and durable, this stylish neoprene sleeve is perfect for taking your 7" tablet, like iPad mini, Kindle, Kindle Fire HD 7", Google Nexus 7, Nook and Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0, wherever you go. The zipper closure and fully enclosed design provide ultimate fit and protection from every angle without adding bulk. Fashionable and detachable wrist lets you carry the sleeve and store it more easily.Available in two color models : Black / Green and Black / Blue. Our soft patterned interior keeps iPad mini, Google Nexus 7, Kindle Fire HD 7" and Kindle safe from scratches.A picture is worth a thousand words. Compare our leather quality in the pictures, we only use the best material possible for the market price. We do not cut corners and go cheap on the interior like some other cases do.*Accessorise (TM) and Accessorise Your Life (TM) are registered and protected US trademarks. Device not included. Although this is not expected, if for any reason you are not happy with our product, please email us back and we will make sure you are promptly taken care of to your satisfaction.
title: SALE 75% Off - AYL Padded Neoprene 7 Inch Tablet Zip Sleeve Case Cover with Built-in Landscape / Portrait Viewing Stand - Black / Green
